author: Anonym
title: Alert for a strong flood of the R√≠o de la Plata: it could exceed 3 meters - The Limited Times
text:
The Naval Hydrography Service (SHN) issued a warning on Friday for a strong flood of the R√≠o de la Plata in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires (CABA), as well as in the coastal areas of the north and south of the Buenos Aires suburbs.
According to the report, the alert is in effect from the afternoon and it is anticipated that the river level will exceed normal values by at least two meters, in some cases exceeding 3 meters.
The message also affects several localities in La Plata. In that Buenos Aires port, in Ensenada, the water level is expected to exceed 3.10 meters. For the port terminal of Buenos Aires, meanwhile, the projected height is 3.20 meters, while in the port of San Fernando it could reach 3.30 meters.
The river is expected to begin to recede on Saturday, according to the SHN report, with levels dropping to at least one meter above normal.
The last similar record occurred a few days ago and was after the powerful storm of December 17 when the water exceeded the height of 3.5 meters and generated flooding in the AMBA.
City sources reported that this was the highest record in more than 10 years. In fact, it surpassed the previous peak, in 2010, which was 3.58 meters. In San Fernando, meanwhile, it reached 3.60 meters.
On that occasion, different streets in the districts of the City of Buenos Aires, Tigre, San Fernando, Avellaneda and Quilmes, among others, began to flood. Videos of water rushing through neighborhoods closest to the river quickly went viral on social media. Now the authorities have warned of a similar situation.
For this Friday the weather in the City of Buenos Aires and the Buenos Aires suburbs will be with somewhat cloudy skies, low probability of showers until the afternoon, wind from the southeast sector, with gusts of up to 50 kilometers per hour during the day, and the temperature will have a minimum of 19 degrees and a maximum of 27 degrees. reported the National Meteorological Service (SMN).
For tomorrow, Saturday, the agency forecasts a day with clear to slightly cloudy skies, then partly cloudy, winds from the southeast rotating to the east, then to the northeast, and a temperature that will be between 12 degrees minimum and 26 degrees maximum.

title: Padres de San Diego cancelan su FanFest 2024 | Noticias de M√©xico | El Imparcial
text: Padres de San Diego cancelan su FanFest 2024 Debido a los pronosticos del clima para este fin de semana, los Padres de San Diego cancelaron la edici√≥n 2024 de su FanFest e informaron que recompensar√°n a sus aficionados. Por los pron√≥sticos del clima, los Padres de San Diego decidieron cancelar su edici√≥n 2024 del FanFest que ten√≠an programada para este domingo en Petco Park. Para los aficionados que retiraron por medio de su portal los boletos que eran gratuitos, se les dar√° a cambio entradas para los juegos de preparaci√≥n ante los Marineros de Seattle que se jugar√°n el lunes 25 de marzo a las 18:40 y el martes 26 a las 13:10. Te puede interesar: [¬°Se perder√° a Messi! Fan de Rayados intenta usar boleto filtrado vs Inter de Miami y acaba muy mal](https://www.elimparcial.com/deporte/2024/03/21/se-perdera-a-messi-fan-de-rayados-intenta-usar-boleto-filtrado-vs-inter-de-miami-y-acaba-muy-mal/) FanFest canceled due to weather.‚Äî Annie Heilbrunn (@annieheilbrunn) [#Padres] [pic.twitter.com/esgvNdL3B9] [March 22, 2024] ‚ÄúDebido a las expectativas del clima que incluyen la posibilidad de tormenta el√©ctrica, fuertes lluvias y viento‚Äù, explicaron como las razones de su cancelaci√≥n mediante un bolet√≠n. El FanFest de este a√±o contemplaba un juego de celebridades de Softbol donde participar√≠an Brandon Moreno, Rey Mysterio Jr, Landon Donovan, Drew Brees, Alex Morgan. We will be honoring our beloved former Chairman and Owner, Peter Seidler, with a celebration of life ceremony at‚Äî San Diego Padres (@Padres) [@PetcoPark]on Saturday, March 23 at 1pm PT üíõ Details: [https://t.co/aQBqPu9PU0] [pic.twitter.com/ONSjNDFoDz] [February 8, 2024] En el comunicado se explic√≥ que los aficionados pueden elegir entre el primero juego o segundo ante Marineros de Seattle y los asientos ser√°n los de la parte superior del estadio. El primer nivel de asientos, como parte de la celebraci√≥n de los 20 a√±os de Petco Park, se mantendr√° con un costo de 20 d√≥lares para adultos y 10 para ni√±os. Te puede interesar: [Regresa Jos√© ‚ÄòChapul√≠n‚Äô Salas a boxear en TJ tras sparrings con Inoue](https://www.elimparcial.com/deporte/2024/03/21/regresa-jose-chapulin-salas-a-boxear-en-tj-tras-sparrings-con-inoue/) Este s√°bado tendr√°n una celebraci√≥n de la vida de su difunto propietario Peter Seidler, misma que tambi√©n se movi√≥ un par de horas por las condiciones climatol√≥gicas. Con el nuevo horario, el evento dar√° inicio a las 11:00 de este s√°bado 23 de marzo. For Peter.‚Äî San Diego Padres (@Padres) For San Diego. For The Faithful. author: MENAFN
title: China Urges US To Stop Meddling In S. China Sea Issue | MENAFN.COM
text:
( MENAFN - Kuwait News Agency (KUNA)) TOKYO, Dec 28 (KUNA) -- China on Thursday criticized the US for "misrepresenting facts and making groundless accusations on China's legitimate actions of rights protection," saying it strongly deplores and firmly opposes to that.
National Defense Ministry spokesperson Wu Qian made comments at a press conference in Beijing when asked on the remarks of the US Department of Defense.
Washington has said the Chinese military vessels recently conducted unsafe maneuvers against the Philippine ships operating lawfully in the South China Sea, adding that the US is firmly committed to the US-Philippines Mutual Defense Treaty and in close communication with Philippine militaries.
Wu also stressed that China has indisputable sovereignty over Nansha (Spratly) Islands, including Ren'ai Reef in and its adjacent waters. "The US, out of selfish calculations, has been conniving at and emboldening the Philippine's infringement and provocations, and attempting to threaten and coerce China with the US-Philippines Mutual Defense Treaty. It will not work on China," he said.
"Issues related to Ren'ai Reef are between China and the Philippines, and have nothing to do with any third party. We urge the US to immediately stop meddling in the South China Sea issue, stop emboldening and supporting the Philippines' infringement and provocations, and safeguard regional peace and stability with concrete actions," reiterated the spokesperson. (end)
